channel.title: Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

My name is Jia-Xin Zhuang（庄嘉鑫）. Currently, I am a Computer Vision Engineer in Pengcheng Laboratory.

New!!: I am looking for Ph.D position ! !

Research Interest

  • Self-supervised Learning
  • Data imbalance in Medical Image Analysis

Education

  • Sun Yet-sen University (Sep 2018-Jun 2021). M.Eng in Computer Technology.
    Supervisor: Ruixuan Wang, Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang
  • Sun Yet-sen University ((Sep 2014-Jun 2018). B.Sc. in Software Engineering.
    Supervisor: Ruixuan Wang

Publications

* denotes equal contributions

  1. Self-supervised Cross-modal Representation Learning in Video Understanding.
    Master Thesis.
  2. Deep kNN for Medical Image Classiﬁcation.
    Jia-Xin Zhuang, Jiaxin Cai, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    MICCAI , 2020, Lima, Peru. [PDF] [bib]
  3. Fusing Metadata and Dermoscopy Images for Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    Weipeng Li*, Jia-Xin Zhuang*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Wei-Shi Zheng.
    ISBI, 2020, Iowa, USA. [PDF] [code] [bib]
  4. CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data.
    Jia-Xin Zhuang*, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    MIDL, 2019, London. [openreview] [code] [bib] [poster] [slides] [zhihu]
  5. Auxiliary Decoder and Classifier for Imbalanced Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    Zili Xu, Jia-Xin Zhuang, Rong Zhang, Ruixuan Wang, Xuemei Guo and Wei-Shi Zheng.
    AICS, 2020, Hangzhou, China. [PDF]
  6. Solution for Large-scale Long-tailed Recognition with Noisy Labels.
    Yuqiao Xian, Jia-Xin Zhuang, Fufu Yu.
    CVPR 2021 AliProducts Challenge: Large-scale Product Recognition. [Technical Report] [Video] [Code]
  7. Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection Using Deep Neural Network Ensemble.
    Jia-Xin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Siyamalan*, Ruixuan Wang , JianGuo Zhang, Jihan Liu, Jiahui Pan, Ziyu Yin.
    MICCAIW 2018. [Technical Report], [Code]

Manuscripts

  • DisCo: Remedy Self-supervised Learning on Lightweight Models with Distilled Contrastive Learning [ArXiv], [Code]
  • On the Analysis of Removing Shortcut Connection and Beyond.

Research Experience

  • Tencent Youtu AI Lab (Oct 2020 – June 2021). Research Intern on Self-suspervision and Model Architecture Design. Advisor: Dr. Sun Xing

Awards

  • Rank 2 (out of 623 teams). CVPR 2021 AliProducts Challenge: Large-scale Product Recognition.

  • Rank 3 (out of 77 teams). MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018. Note: top 2 teams used additional public dataset to train models.

  • Excellent Students in iSEE Lab. Sun Yat-sen University, 2019-2020.

Services

  • Reviewer of ACM-MM2021, MICCAI2021

My Life

  • I like to take pictures to record our precious life, and run.
  • I watch many Japanese comics, such as One Piece.
  • I love a special member of our family, a very cute cat.

Recent Coauthors

» Updated on Aug-2021 «
